description: Translate only rows producing an NFL value. Concatenated values are separated with a dash hear to make them more readable. Combinations of values match those in the nfl validations below.

translation_rules: padConcat({inventory_id, src_filename, '', orig_stand_id, poly_id}, {4,15,10,10,7}, {'x','x','x','x','x'}, '-', TRUE, TRUE)
description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Validation: only want to translate soil moisture in NFL table if the row is either non_for_veg or has a nat_non_veg value of EXPOSED_LAND (burned or exposed land).
No horizontal structure so structure percent is 100

validation_rules: notNull(type_lnd|NOT_APPLICABLE);notEmpty(type_lnd|NOT_APPLICABLE);matchList(type_lnd, {'Non-Vegetated, Water', 'Non-Vegetated, Snow/Ice', 'Non-Vegetated, Exposed Land'}|NOT_APPLICABLE);yvi03_nat_non_veg_validation(type_lnd, class, landpos, cover_type)
description: Checks type_lnd is not empty and is in 'Non-Vegetated, Water', 'Non-Vegetated, Snow/Ice', 'Non-Vegetated, Exposed Land. Then checks either landpos is 'Alpine', or class is in 'River','Lake' or cover_type is in 'River Sediments','Exposed Soil','Burned Area','Rock & Rubble'. Translation converts landpos Alpine to ALPINE, and'River','Lake', 'River Sediments','Exposed Soil','Burned Area','Rock & Rubble' to 'RIVER','LAKE','WATER_SEDIMENT','EXPOSED_LAND','EXPOSED_LAND','ROCK_RUBBLE'.
Checks type_lnd is not empty. Checks type_lnd is 'Non-Vegetated, Urban/Industrial', and class is 'Road Surface', 'Gravel Pit', 'Tailings'. Maps  'Road Surface', 'Gravel Pit', 'Tailings' to OTHER.

validation_rules: notNull(type_lnd|NOT_APPLICABLE);notEmpty(type_lnd|NOT_APPLICABLE);matchList(type_lnd, {'Vegetated, Non-Forested'}|NOT_APPLICABLE);matchList(class, {'Tall Shrub', 'Low Shrub', 'Tall Shrub, Open', 'Tall Shrub, Closed'})
description: Checks type_lnd is not empty. Checks type_lnd is 'Vegetated, Non-Forested', and cl_mod is one of 'Tall Shrub', 'Tall Shrub, Open', 'Tall Shrub, Closed', 'Low Shrub'. Converts cl_mod of 'Tall Shrub', 'Tall Shrub, Open', 'Tall Shrub, Closed', 'Low Shrub' to TALL_SHRUB, TALL_SHRUB, TALL_SHRUB, LOW_SHRUB.
